about_the_game: The soundtrack for Curvatron was provided by people all over the world completely free of charge. This is an organized compilation of their work. Most of the artists seem to have disappeared from the face of the earth by now 💀
detailed_description: The soundtrack for Curvatron was provided by people all over the world completely free of charge. This is an organized compilation of their work. Most of the artists seem to have disappeared from the face of the earth by now 💀
name: Curvatron Soundtrack

Minimum:

short_description: The full soundtrack for Curvatron. Each track by a different artist.
